column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////If you are visiting downtown Chicago area
column2: this place is a must for dinner. The restaurant is setup like an old fashion steakhouse
column3: but nothing old fashion about the food. Service was phenomenal! First we tried the oysters which were delicious. Then we indulged in the strip with bone marrow on top. Our sides were the Mac and cheese
column5: and the brussel sprouts (which ended up being my favorite thing to eat on the table). We were too full to order dessert
column6: but if I had room I would of tried the carrot cake. Also
column7: they have a great selection of cocktails
column8: with different styles of the classic old fashion. Would love to grab dinner here again if I am ever back in town.
